job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Our client is a large hedge fund that prides themselves as being innovative and offering an environment that breeds uniqueness. Our client is looking to identify a Site Reliability Engineer to live in between systems operations and development by being on the front line in ensuring that the firm’s technology works. </p><p>&nbsp; </p> <p><strong>What You Will Get:</strong> </p> <p>-Competitive compensation package </p> <p>-Unique work culture </p> <p>-Diverse team environment </p><p><br> </p> <p><strong>What You Will Do as a Site Reliability Engineer:</strong> </p> <p>-Design and develop software and reliability into architecture </p> <p>-Create automated tests, deploy and validate services </p> <p>-Improve service reliability through DevOps capabilities </p> <p>-Gather and analyze metrics from systems and applications </p><p><br> </p> <p><strong>What You Will Need as a Site Reliability Engineer:</strong> </p> <p>-BS degree in Computer Science or related field preferred </p> <p>-3+ year(s) working with cloud providers like AWS, Azure and Google Cloud Platform </p> <p>-Experience with Ansible, Terraform, Chef, RunDeck and other similar technologies </p> <p>-Knowledge of systems and platforms such as Unix/Linux </p> <p>&nbsp; </p> <p>Our client is not offering relocation packages. </p> Our client is unable to transfer or sponsor visas at this time.
